name: WangReal Engine Game Data Archive
summary: An NOP file is an archive used by White Day: A Labyrinth Named School, a Korean survival horror game. It contains data files for the game, which include animations, textures, meshes, and transitions. NOP files are compressed to reduce the amount of space taken up by game assets.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Sonnori White Day: A Labyrinth Named School
